description:
Slide into a world of tabletop football, crafted for the Nintendo Switch™ experience. Whether you're waiting for your teams next match or chilling at home, the thrill of the foosball table is just a Joy-Con™ slide away.

Pick from a set of designed tables, player figurines and balls to match your mood.
Opt for 3 or 4-row grid layouts, tailoring the challenge to your skill level.
Solo play? No problem. Got a friend? Even better! Dive into head-to-head battles on a shared screen.

Track your progression, snag those coveted trophies, and lay down the gauntlet as the Pocket Foosball maestro everyone's talking about.

Joy-Con controllers ready? Let's bring that tabletop action to life!
name: Pocket Foosball
intro: Pocket Foosball - Table football excitement, Nintendo Switch™-Style!
